title: Data Engineer - Spark/Scala
tagsAndSkills: Spark,DataLake,Business Intelligence,Data Pipeline,Scala,Kafka,Data Warehousing,Intelligence
jobDescription:
Job Description :


We are seeking a highly skilled and motivated Spark 3.X and Scala Developer to join our team. The ideal candidate will have expertise in Spark 3.X, Scala, Delta Lake implementation, streaming solution implementation for IoT using Spark Streaming, and Kafka. Experience with Manufacturing Business Intelligence (BI), Data Warehouse (DWH), and Data Lake implementation will be considered a significant bonus.

Key Responsibilities :

- Spark Development: Design, develop, and optimize Spark applications using Spark 3.X and Scala to process large datasets efficiently.

- Delta Lake Implementation: Implement Delta Lake architecture for data lakes, ensuring data consistency, reliability, and performance.

- Streaming Solutions: Design and implement real-time streaming solutions for IoT data using Spark Streaming, Kafka, and related technologies.

- Kafka Expertise: Manage and configure Kafka clusters, create topics, and develop Kafka producers and consumers for data streaming.

- Data Warehousing: Collaborate with the data warehouse team to ensure seamless data integration and provide insights into manufacturing data.

- Manufacturing BI: If applicable, contribute to Manufacturing Business Intelligence by developing data pipelines and analytics solutions tailored to manufacturing needs.

- Documentation: Create and maintain comprehensive technical documentation for Spark applications, streaming solutions, and data pipelines.

Qualifications :


- Bachelor's or Master's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or related field.

- Proven experience in Spark 3.X and Scala development.

- Strong expertise in Delta Lake implementation.

- Proficiency in designing and implementing real-time streaming solutions for IoT using Spark Streaming and Kafka.

- Knowledge of Manufacturing Business Intelligence (BI) concepts is a bonus.

- Familiarity with Data Warehouse (DWH) and Data Lake implementation is a plus.

- Excellent problem-solving and debugging skills.

- Effective communication and teamwork abilities.

- Ability to work remotely and adhere to the Malaysia Timezone.

title: Module Lead - Java
tagsAndSkills: Java,Design Patterns,PostgreSQL,Microservices Architecture,MySQL,Concurrency Patterns,Spring Boot,SOAP Webservices
jobDescription:
Requirements:

  • You have mastered multiple platforms and - whether it is SOAP vs REST or Postgres/MySQL - you know when to use which and can argue all the pros and cons of Strong typing vs ease of use OR browser compatibility issues vs lack of community support OR MVCC vs multiple backend storage engines OR scalability vs simplicity etc.
  • You continue to be very involved in technology and still check-in code.
  • You are passionate about automated testing, good design, performance and scalability. You have exceptional oral/written communication skills, excellent logical reasoning and a keen sense of business.
  • You can deliver good software with a kick-ass user experience, at a rapid pace.
  • You have 5-8 years of software development experience (The more core-Java focused the better)
  • Extensive LLD Design Pattern Experience needed for the profile.
  • You have a track record of working on scalable applications, preferably at a major internet property or well known startup
  • You have a good grasp on programming fundamentals including OOP, Design Patterns, Algorithms, DataStructures, Networking and OS Concepts.
  • Good understanding of Java concurrency concepts.
  • You have an experience of leading a team of atleast 2-3 people or mentoring on technical aspects of project.
  • You have experience in building things from scratch for microservices architecture .
  • Have experience in code-reviews: one-on-one as well as online and having strong opinions about beautiful and quality code.
  • You are familiar with relational databases, experience of writing complex queries (we use MS-SQL/MySQL)
  • You can exhibit a passion and enthusiasm for remarkable technology (Knowledge and contribution to open source projects, Active Blog, etc...)
  • You have the ability to learn emerging technical standards and apply/coach development team in proper adoption.
  • Knowledge and experience working with frameworks like Spring, Spring boot , Hibernate would be bonus.
  • As an individual - it's in your nature to question why things are the way they are

title: Business Analyst/Senior Analyst - Ad Tech Domain
tagsAndSkills: Ad Tech Domain,IT Project Delivery,R,Business Analyst,Project Management,Python,SQL,Business analysis
jobDescription:
Roles and Responsibilities :

  • Research, assimilate and share insights on the industry, competitive landscape, and the business
  • Identify, track and model data around key business drivers
  • Solve complex challenges related to product, user experience, performance and scale
  • Create compelling visual representations of data, automate reports & setup alerts to enhance consumption and usage of data
  • Provide actionable data driven insights and recommendations to relevant teams and
  • Suggest detailed execution plans
Qualification and Experience :
  • You should have 3 - 7 years of experience in a techno-commercial role. (Ad Tech Background is must)
  • You should be strong at data analysis and comfortable with large volumes of data
  • You understand technology and are passionate about building a career in the Internet space.
  • You have exceptional written and verbal communication skills.
  • Firm decision-making skills and ability to influence stakeholders whilst delivering on projects
Who should apply for the role :
  • Self-starter who can work in an entrepreneurial environment
  • Work experience in either of Marketing Analytics, Product Analytics, Digital Marketing
  • Experimentation or related fields
  • Demonstrated analytical skills, combined with business judgment and ability to influence business decisions
  • Ability to create and foster cross functional networks and manage without authority
  • Excellent communication skills, with the ability to construct simple and impactful messages from complex analysis
  • Proficient in MS Excel & SQL
  • Experience with Tableau, knowledge of R/Python would be good to have
  • Experience with Mixpanel /Amplitude platforms would be preferred
  • Strong understanding of statistics and probabilistic methods
Insights : Specialty - Contextual Advertising, Advertising, Header Bidding, and Advertising Technology

Must Have :
  • Techno-commercial background
  • Generating data insights.
  • Expertise in dashboards, whitepapers, presentations
  • Research, assimilate and share insights on the industry
  • Data Analysis on product, user experience, performance and scale
  • Data Modeling Experience
  • Data visualization tools
Good to Have :

title: Equity Dealers
tagsAndSkills: Risk Management,Equity Securities,Investment Strategies,Stock Market,Market Analysis,Equity Trading,Trade Execution,Trade
jobDescription:
1.Trade Execution: Execute client and proprietary trades in equities and related securities, ensuring accuracy and compliance with relevant regulations, comprehensive understanding of equity and derivatives markets, strong analytical skills.
2.Market Analysis: Monitor market trends, news, and financial reports to make informed trading decisions and advise clients or internal stakeholders.
3.Client Interaction: Communicate with clients to understand their investment goals and provide recommendations on equity investments.
4.Risk Management: Assess and manage risks associated with trades, including market, credit, and operational risks, to safeguard the firms and clients assets.
5.Compliance: Adhere to regulatory requirements and internal policies to ensure all trading activities are compliant with legal and ethical standards.
6.Reporting: Prepare and present trading performance reports, market analysis, and trade summaries to clients and senior management.
7.Strategy Development: Contribute to the development and implementation of trading strategies and investment plans to meet clients financial goals.
8.Collaboration: Work closely with other traders, analysts, and portfolio managers to optimize trading strategies and share market insights.

title: Specialist MEC
tagsAndSkills: Interpersonal skills,Pressure vessels,Project management,Diversity and Inclusion,Quality assurance systems,Marine engineering,Technical Professional,Recruitment
jobDescription:
We are looking for professionals who can carry out plan approval of maritime machinery components, pressure equipment in accordance with the applicable international standards, classes rules, using procedures, experience and knowledge appropriate for the design appraisal of plans for the above-mentioned aspects for new building marine equipment and components/conversion/in service vessels.

What we offer you
  • The opportunity to work for an organization that has a strong sense of purpose, is values driven and helps colleagues to develop professionally and personally through our range of people development programmes.
  • A Full-time permanent role
The role :
  • Carry out plan approval of machinery components (i.e marine engines, steer gears, windlasses, winches), pressure equipment in accordance with appropriate Lloyd s Register Rules Regulations, Statutory Regulations and International Standards.
  • Monitor revisions to Statutory, Rule and Flag requirement and apply these revisions as appropriate;
  • To build and maintain a good relationship with our clients and internal stakeholders.
  • Provide technical advice to internal and external clients.
  • To discuss and present the deliverable with the internal / external client and be able to suggest solutions where appropriate.
  • Undertake project management where applicable including monitoring project progress and spend against budget and contract requirement
  • Coaching of less experienced colleagues and act as a mentor to colleagues as agreed with line manage
What you bring
  • Bachelor or Master degree in Mechanical/ Marine Engineering/ Material/Pressure Vessels or equivalent; and Chartered/Professional qualification and a member of a relevant professional institution.
  • Relevant experience in offshore or marine machinery engineering system design (or appraisal) or mechanical design/pressure vessels design from Yard, Class, Ship owner, Designers, Manufactures, Pressure equipment plant, Power Plant, Chemical and oil refine plant etc
  • Necessary experience/knowledge in the area of marine engineering/pressure equipment plant / Power plant/chemical plant with particular emphasis on one or more of the following are required: Machinery components, Pressure equipment and Plastic pipes, plastic materials or rubber.
  • Knowledge of Quality Assurance systems is preferred.
  • Have the ability to work both independently and as part of a team, to prioritise work and meet LR and Clients deadlines, and to work effectively under pressure.
  • Good skill to maintain relationship with client with client focus mind-set.
  • Proficiency in the English Language commensurate with the work and to demonstrate effective interpersonal skills

title: IT Software - Software Testing & Adhoc
tagsAndSkills: Business process,SAN,Interpersonal skills,French,Access management,sailpoint,Subject matter expertise,Technology solutions
jobDescription:
Job Summary
  • Subject matter expertise for the SailPoint technologies and processes which deliver the Bank s core Identity and Access Management service.
  • Day-to-day support, maintenance and development for the Identity Governance and Assurance technology platforms with a key focus on Sailpoint Technologies.
  • Technical leadership, proactively driving the on-going development and strategy of Identity and Access Management to achieve the outcomes required.
  • Understanding the Identity and Access Management security requirements of the Bank s major programmes of work and ensuring they can be delivered
  • Input into designs and supporting documentation when required for Identity and Access Management solutions.
  • Providing advice for IAM technology and input into technical and business process strategy.
  • Ensuring IAM systems and processes are operating effectively and efficiently Delivering continual improvements to the IAM service which includes supporting the Banks Cyber investment Programme
  • Specialist guidance for IAM solutions , in partnership with Technology Architects, Engineers and System Owners.
  • Understanding of the wider cyber security control set , the key threats facing the Bank and how that relates to the on-going development of the Identity and Access Management controls.
  • Engaging with leaders across technology , communicating key messages to support the ongoing development of IAM solutions.
  • Building effective networks within Cyber and Technology at a working level across the different Technology domains.
  • Challenging upwards, delivering tough messages when required to drive the right outcomes.


Required Skills
  • Several years of hands-on experience in Sailpoint Technologies Good enterprise Identity and Access Management experience and knowledge and how an effective IAM function supports the management of business risk
  • Good understanding of the key processes that make an IAM service (e.g. Access recertifications)
  • Good interpersonal skills and experience of developing effective relationships with key stakeholders.
  • Excellent communication skills , including articulating IAM processes to business representatives and presenting to governance forums
  • Ability to coordinate IAM partners and internal Bank teams on IAM initiatives
  • Experience in producing detailed designs.
  • Experience in producing technology roadmaps.
  • Good general knowledge of IT and technology solutions
  • Ability to work under stress and meet deadlines
  • Self-managing, self-motivated
  • Solid understanding of security standards and relevant legislation Desired


Required Qualification
  • B.Sc/B.Tech/B.E. in Any Specialization or advanced degree in Computer Science or equivalent.
  • Minimum 3 to 5 years of experience


Additional Info
  • You will likely hold certifications in SailPoint and wider industry wide
  • Experience of deploying Identity and Access Management capabilities into hybrid, cloud and multicloud environments

title: Senior Test Engineer
tagsAndSkills: Excel,Test scripts,Project scheduling,Deployment,UAT,Test cases,Powerpoint,Supervision
jobDescription: Consultant QAPrincipal Accountabilities:1.Delivers efficiently and effectively projects based on stakeholder requirements. The incumbent is expected to perform activities such as but not limited to the following: Designing and creating test suites, scenarios, and cases that are traceable to business requirements. Executing functional, integration, performance, and acceptance testing Addressing all testing defects according to the project schedule. Providing timely status and the appropriate escalation of testing issues to IT Project Manager Documenting test results and maintaining the updated version of the test matrices. Obtaining UAT signoff from Business Unit Heads or delegated approvers.2.Recommends test strategies and process improvements to further create efficiencies.1.Manages the deployment of resolution and fixes to production region ensuring appropriate actions are taken to support continuity of stakeholder s operations. The role is tasked to execute the following: Reporting post implementation issues through an exception report tool:Analyzing and providing recommendation on the issue. coordinating with users and/or development team for resolution of the issue, if applicable.Performing testing of the resolution provided. Securing sign off from users of the solution, if applicable. Raising change in requirements to resolve issues reported if any. Challenges:The position is expected to handle multiple projects at a time. There is a need for flexibility during times of change and quickly responding to project adjustments.Position Requirements:1.Graduate of IT-related course or any Business-related course.2.Skilled in advanced use of MS Applications (Word, Excel, PowerPoint)3.Proficiency in creating detailed test plans, test cases, and test scripts.4.Creative and Innovative Root Causing and Problem-Solving with the ability to self-start and execute project activities with minimal supervision
